title: Cambridge Bike Memory Test for Children
Practice
content:
Memorize the bike in the next three images.

A test will follow.

Press ENTER to begin.

trialText: Practice
Practice
Practice
Which bike did you just view?
feedbackIncorrect: Oops! It was the bike in the middle!

trialText: Which bike did you just view?
feedbackIncorrect: Oops! It was the first bike!

trialText: Which bike did you just view?
feedbackIncorrect: Oops! It was the last bike!

content:
These were the practice trials.

Great! Let's go on and do the actual test.

In this test, you will learn to recognize six bikes.

To begin memorizing the first bike, click START.

content:
Next you will review the same six bikes for 20 seconds.

press ENTER.

trialText: Review the bikes (20 seconds)

content:
Now your memory of these bikes will be tested.

In the remaining trials, the correct answer can be any of the six bikes.

The incorrect bikes are sometimes very similar to the target bikes, so be sure to look at each bike prior to answering.

press ENTER.
